column1: #Text=Sokka says : " The marks make ya look sick , but you got ta act sick too .
#Text=" Old man says : " Years of practice .
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang , what are you doing ?
#Text=I 'm not leaving until I find Bumi .
#Text=" Aang says : " Sorry Momo , I 'll feed you later .
#Text=" Ukano says : " What is going on down there ?
#Text=" Guard says : " I saw some kids yesterday who were sick with pentapox .
#Text=Hmm , I 'm pretty sure I 've heard of that .
#Text=" Michi says : " Oh , this is terrible .
#Text=" Guard says : " What should we do ?
#Text=" Ukano says : " Drive them out of the city ... but do n't touch them !
#Text=We have to rid the city of this disease !
#Text=You got ta help me find Bumi .
#Text=Oh ... I guess that does n't work with you .
